On Apr 29, 2010, at 7:12 PM, steve@... wrote:
> there is also a bin/arcreader shell
> script provided in the distribution.


why the warc-reader (included in the wayback machine)
is not provided with heritrix?

moreover (even if not related to this thread):
warcdump (included in warc-tools) used to extract a resource
from a warc file with a given offset, is not yet working
with warc 1.0
is there any other implementation of such tool?

ciao
